name: Free Kick - Asian Cup 2015
description:
Help your team lead the online rating!

What is your favorite Asian Cup team? You can choose any team participating in the championship Asian Cup 2015, then defeat selected opponent and climb up in the rankings! But be sure to remember: the other teams will be assisted by the same players as you are.

The game is totally about series of free kicks on goal. Scoring goals with the standard provisions will be interfered by: "wall", fickle wind, and, of course, agile goalkeeper.

At this point in the game, there are three basic modes:

- "Training" - a chance to hone their skills without risking positions in the rankings.
- "Arcade" - A series of penalty shots, results to be entered in the personal record on Gamecenter.
- "Championship" - a test for the best. Competition with other players for the title of best team.
